extends java.lang.Object

FileListFunctions

Method Detail

saveWindowSettings

protected static void saveWindowSettings(FileListWindow flw)
Saves the window positions and dimensions for: filelist window output window summary window input window the output file is located at "SIMS_settings.dat"

Parameters:
flw - the filelist window (its not global so you have to pass it)

loadSettings

public static void loadSettings(FileListWindow flw)
Loads SIMS_settings.dat and sets the windows according to the contents of the file. If an error occurs, window settings will be reset to default.

Parameters:
flw - the file list window to move.

saveFileList

protected static void saveFileList(java.util.ArrayList<DataHouse> list)
Saves the contents of the filelist.

Parameters:
list - and arraylist of datahouses.

loadFileList

protected static void loadFileList(FileListWindow flw)
loads the contents of the file list and updates the filelist window.

Parameters:
flw - the filelist window

requestSystemWipe

protected static boolean requestSystemWipe()
Request the user for a system wipe.

Returns:
true of the user agrees

removeFromSystem

protected static void removeFromSystem(java.lang.String fileName,
                                       FileListWindow flw)
Removes an input file from the entire system and updates the required GUI components.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file
flw - a FileListWindow

updateTable

protected static void updateTable()
Update the summary table. This is required after every update.

loadInput

protected static DataHouse[] loadInput()
Creates a FileChooser and loads selected input files. Returns null reference if a major error occurs. Array entries can be null if file could not be opened.

Returns:
DataHouse[]

requestRemove

protected static boolean requestRemove(DataHouse dh)
Prompts user if they want to remove file. This only prompts the user, it does not remove the file.

Parameters:
dh - the file that they want to remove
Returns:
true if user selects ok false otherwise

removeRedundancies

protected static DataHouse[] removeRedundancies(DataHouse[] dh,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<DataHouse> alreadyImported)
Scans and removes already loaded files. The user is asked before a file is overwritten.

Parameters:
dh - a list of new imported files
alreadyImported - an arraylist of already imported files
Returns:
DataHouse[] an array of new files to be added.
